Package-List: courier-base deb mail optional arch=any courier-doc deb doc optional arch=all courier-faxmail deb mail optional arch=any courier-imap deb mail optional arch=any courier-ldap deb mail optional arch=any courier-mlm deb mail optional arch=any courier-mta deb mail optional arch=any courier-pcp deb mail optional arch=any courier-pop deb mail optional arch=any courier-webadmin deb mail optional arch=any sqwebmail deb mail optional arch=any
